mapper.select: select s.sno, s.is_scrap, n.nno as story_no, n.title as story_title, n.url as story_url, n.site as story_site, n.rdt as story_rdt, m.mno as member_no, m.nick as member_nick, s.rdt from pet_st_news n inner join pet_st_scrap s on n.nno=s.nno inner join pet_user m on s.mno=m.mno where m.mno=#{value}

select s.sno, s.is_scrap, n.nno as story_no, n.title as story_title, n.url as story_url, n.site as story_site, n.rdt as story_rdt, m.mno as member_no, m.nick as member_nick, s.rdt from pet_st_news n inner join pet_st_scrap s on n.nno=s.nno inner join pet_user m on s.mno=m.mno where s.sno=#{value}
